description: [SILENTTRINITY](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0692) can use the `GetRegValue` function to check Registry keys within `HKCU\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\AlwaysInstallElevated` and `HKLM\Software\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\Installer\AlwaysInstallElevated`. It also contains additional modules that can check software AutoRun values and use the Win32 namespace to get values from HKCU, HKLM, HKCR, and HKCC hives.(Citation: GitHub SILENTTRINITY Modules July 2019)

external_references.description: Salvati, M. (2019, August 6). SILENTTRINITY Modules. Retrieved March 24, 2022.
